About

Learn more about Blade Lucas.

My name is Blade Lucas, I am 27 years old and I am a recent graduate of the the Computer Programming and Analysis advanced diploma program at Durham College. I have been an avid programmer since my first computer science class in grade 10 when I was 15 years old, and have been advancing my skill set since then.

Languages

Throughout my journey in computer science, I have been constantly learning and developing my skills, and I suspect this will be an ongoing effort throughout my career aswell. I started in highschool with Java, and only moved onto other languages once hitting College. My skill set now contains many different OOP, web development and scripting languages, inclufing, but not limited to:

  • C# and C++
  • Java
  • Python
  • HTML, CSS, PHP, Javascript
  • SQL
  • Frameworks (.NET, Laravel, Ruby, Flutter)
  • Other assorted languages (Dart, VB, etc.)

Skills

Outside of my programming skills, I am also a natural leader and team player. I worked as a department manager for several years at Best Buy, and lead several projects during my time at Durham College. I am also very analytical and quick on my feet. I am also known for being very personable and easy to talk to, fostering good relations with colleagues and peers. Among my soft skills are:

  • Leadership
  • Teamwork
  • Organization
  • Problem Solving and Analysis
  • Project Planning/Management
